tome_basic.name: Basic Spell Tome
tome_basic.description: An ancient tome containing the basic principles of spellcasting. The pages glow with a faint blue light.

tome_advanced.name: Advanced Spell Tome
tome_advanced.description: A more complex tome that delves into advanced magical theory. The cover is bound in dragon leather.

spell_scroll.name: Spell Scroll
spell_scroll.description: A scroll containing a powerful spell. The parchment crackles with magical energy.

health_potion.name: Health Potion
health_potion.description: A red potion that restores health when consumed. The liquid bubbles gently.

mana_potion.name: Mana Potion
mana_potion.description: A blue potion that restores magical energy. It glows with an inner light.

star_crystal.name: Star Crystal
star_crystal.description: A crystal that seems to contain a piece of the night sky. Stars twinkle within its depths.

mana_essence.name: Mana Essence
mana_essence.description: Pure magical energy in liquid form. It shimmers with all the colors of the rainbow.
